translations: 装玻璃的工人；上釉工人

sentences.sentence: Glaziers cut, fit, install and replace glass in residential, commercial and industrial buildings, on exterior walls of buildings and other structures and in furniture and other products.
sentences.translation: 玻璃匠切割，调试，安装和更换住宅，商业和工业建筑，建筑物外墙上和其他结构以及家具等产品的玻璃。
